backend/main.mo: Motoko backend with access-controlled CRUD for schools, teachers, trainings, reviews, user profiles, and blog posts.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking feature requests to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing major frontend components, pages, hooks, and styles.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining OKLCH theme variables and light/dark mode color tokens with global background/foreground styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router setup defining all site routes, layout with header/footer, theme provider, and toast system.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminAcces: Admin authentication gate using Internet Identity with sign-in/out flows and conditional admin dashboard access.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminDashb: Tabbed admin dashboard providing navigation to school, teacher, training, and review management sections.
frontend/src/components/admin/sections/R: Displays all reviews with school lookup, loading state, and delete confirmation actions.
frontend/src/components/admin/sections/S: Provides CRUD management for schools with create/edit dialogs, delete actions, and a table view.
frontend/src/components/admin/sections/T: Manages teachers, including creation with school assignment, listing, and deletion.
Handles creation and deletion of training programs with validation and school association.
frontend/src/components/directory/Direct: Renders informational sections explaining how the directory works and its benefits.
frontend/src/components/directory/School: Displays a school card with thumbnail, location, training badges, teacher count, and a details button.
frontend/src/components/directory/Teache: Displays a list of teachers with avatars and specialization badges, or a placeholder if none are provided.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Renders the site footer with navigation links, contact info, and attribution.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Provides the top navigation bar with theme toggle, links, logo, and a mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/school/AboutScho: Shows an about section for a school with customizable or default descriptive text.
frontend/src/components/school/faqConten: Exports a list of default FAQ items with common school-related questions and answers.
frontend/src/components/school/FAQSectio: Displays an accordion-based FAQ list for a school.
frontend/src/components/school/ImageGall: Renders an image gallery with clickable thumbnails and a modal viewer, using default images if none are provided.
frontend/src/components/school/SchoolInq: Implements a contact form with validation, success messaging, and simulated submission.
frontend/src/components/school/SchoolMap: Shows a Google Maps embed for a school location with a link to open in Google Maps.
frontend/src/components/school/SchoolPro: Displays a banner with school name, location, background image, and optional inquiry button.
frontend/src/components/school/SchoolRev: Displays school reviews, calculates averages, and provides an authenticated form for submitting new reviews.
frontend/src/components/school/SchoolTra: Renders a list of training courses with metadata, descriptions, and actions to view curriculum or inquire.
frontend/src/components/school/SchoolVid: Extracts a YouTube video ID and embeds the video or shows a fallback message if unavailable.
frontend/src/components/school/SimilarSc: Fetches and displays similar schools with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/hooks/admin/useAdminReviews: Provides admin hooks to fetch all reviews across schools and a placeholder mutation for deletion.
frontend/src/hooks/admin/useAdminSchools: Admin hooks for listing, creating, updating, and deleting schools with backend error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/admin/useAdminTeacher: Admin hooks to fetch, create, and delete teachers aggregated across all schools.
frontend/src/hooks/admin/useAdminTrainin: Provides admin queries and mutations for listing, creating, and deleting trainings, with cache invalidation and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBlogPosts.ts: Fetches all blog posts or a single post using the backend actor with error logging.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context, loading stored identities and providing login/logout utilities.
frontend/src/hooks/useSchoolCardData.ts: Fetches trainings and teachers for a school to populate school card components.
frontend/src/hooks/useSchoolDetails.ts: Loads a school's details along with its teachers and trainings, exposing loading and error states.
frontend/src/hooks/useSchoolReviews.ts: Fetches school reviews and provides a mutation to submit new reviews with cache updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useSchools.ts: Queries all schools and applies training-hour filtering with optional training fetches and error logging.
frontend/src/hooks/useSimilarSchools.ts: Computes similar schools by comparing training hours and returns top-scoring matches.
frontend/src/hooks/useTrainingCurriculum: Retrieves a school and a training by ID for curriculum pages, with loading and error aggregation.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and color themes for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/lib/backendDiagnostics.ts: Provides a helper to log structured diagnostic info for failed backend calls.
frontend/src/lib/blogContent.ts: Provides helpers to generate excerpts, split blog content into paragraphs, and choose between explicit or generated excerpts.
frontend/src/lib/schoolThumbnails.ts: Maps school IDs to deterministic thumbnail images using a simple hash, with a fallback thumbnail.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query client and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with mission info, feature cards, and placeholder text.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Wraps the admin dashboard with an authentication gate using Internet Identity.
frontend/src/pages/BlogPage.tsx: Displays a list of blog posts with loading, error, and empty states, using generated excerpts.
frontend/src/pages/BlogPostPage.tsx: Shows a full blog post with featured image, paragraphs, and navigation back to the blog.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Provides contact information cards and a non-functional placeholder contact form.
frontend/src/pages/DirectoryPage.tsx: Shows a directory of schools with filtering, banners, scroll controls, and loading/error handling.
frontend/src/pages/SchoolDetailPage.tsx: Renders a detailed school profile page with sections for teachers, FAQs, media, maps, reviews, and inquiry form, including loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/SubmitClaimSchoolPage: Static informational page describing how users can submit or claim a school, with disabled placeholder buttons for future workflows.
frontend/src/pages/TrainingCurriculumPag: Displays detailed curriculum information for a specific training, handling loading/error states and generating highlights from the description.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for getting, storing, and clearing URL parameters, including persistent session-based retrieval and hash cleanup.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and enabling typography, container queries, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: JSON metadata describing project state, features, issues, and architectural notes for the yoga school directory system.
